item.description:
Dance at the Phoenix   9:30 pm.

RE:SET presents MIKE SWELLS + RYAN OBERMILLER + BISON

Wednesday, April 24, 2013 at 10:00pm Ryan Obermiller and 10 other guests

Re:Set Wednesdays at The Phoenix LandingCambridge, Massachusetts

Host: Steve Ob1. 603-491-1962   ob@tds.net

This is Steve Ob1."s favorite Djs  So, please join him and his friends for an evening dance and music. This is a difference kind of Night Club. Everyone dances where they stand. They dance with a partner, or without one. They just get into the music and move. This more of a music show than your tipical Dj. This is "House music" and it will drive you to dance. There will  be three Djs playing. Ryan O. will be the opener at 10 pm.  So, come on out and meet some new and old friends. Steve Ob1. always does his best to try an get everyone introduced at his events.  Look for the Meetup signs by the Dj.

No dress code and no cover charge.
item.how_to_find_us: Look 4 the Meetup signs by the Dj.

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Dance @ the Phoenix Landing
